data.title: Stretford Children's Theatre
data.meta_description: Our aim is to inspire, educate and enrich our young and wider community by providing high-quality, accessible performing arts sessions, and through public productions.
data.text:
Our mission is to inspire, educate and enrich our young and wider community by providing high-quality, accessible performing arts sessions, and through public productions.

​

See information about our Weekly Sessions here.

Our aims include:

​

Providing fun, creative opportunities for our members

Increasing confidence, resilience, and independence

Developing collaboration and leadership skills to enhance future employability

Supporting physical and mental health and well-being

Providing a safe and respectful environment for all

Being participant-led

Being an affordable resource for all the community

Developing knowledge and appreciation of the arts

Encouraging connection with our local community

Working with local partners to be a positive community constituent

Ensuring we eliminate or minimise any negative environmental impacts of our operations

Being a robust, accountable, and sustainable organisation

We want to build and sustain a valued community organisation that is well-known for its participant-led performing arts offer; and an environment where everyone feels valued and supported to reach their full potential.
